title: Game Character American Soldier - Female
description: Hire a female military voice in your next game audio production with Game Character American Solider - Female, a game-ready collection of human voice over sound files created for modern, war, fantasy & sci-fi games.
longDescription:
Audio Demo


This voice-over sound library features a female protagonist game character with a duty to serve her country inspired by first-person shooter games.


Game Character American Soldier - Female voiceover sound library provides you with more than 510+ immersive, game-ready voice-over sound files, vocalizations, battle cries, custom character-specific dialogue lines, stock non-player character dialogue lines, and everything needed to create compelling cinematic scenes, character, and outstanding gameplay audio experiences. 


You may also like:

Creepy Game

Game Weapons

Total War

War UI


Full of Character


The Female American’s voice profile is structured, empathic, confident with a crispy vocal performance. She is perfect for a marine, soldier, captain, good guy, protagonist, NPC or any military game characters needed. His voice is ready for your game as is, provided in clean audio format in case you want to further process with vocals effects. 


Includes Two File Variations


Female American solider voice pack comes in two file variations - radio & human. Radio is an effect applied to the file to mimic a walkie-talkie and/or telephone. Human is just the real voice recorded lightly edited. Being able to have both file variation types will help you have the right sound needed at any given time. The American’s voice profile is confident, cocky, brave, with a robust vocal performance. 



UCS Compliant & Soundminer Metadata 


All sound effects labelling is UCS compliant & is organized into categories to make it easier to navigate with understandable folder structures: Human/Radio main folders with subfolders: Battle Cries, Breathing, Coughing, Crying, Custom Lines, Fighting, Jumping, Laughing, Pain Efforts, and Stock Lines. On top of UCS, Game Character American Soldier - Female features extensive metadata embedded in the files using soundminer metadata to help you find the right sound at the right time.


Game Character American Soldier - Female voiceover sound effects are not only packed with high-quality voice recordings but includes thought-out, cohesive scripted dialogue and vocalizations to help you build dynamic stories, game trailers, in-game characters, dramatic moments and so much more. 


Product details:

512 female soldier voice audio files

254.4 MB of voice samples

All in 16bit/44k .wav file format

Included entire library in - both wet (radio voice fx) & dry style

Includes Soundminer Metadata

UCS Compliant

AAA Game Character Voice-Over Sound Effects Library

18 battle cries

8 breathing sounds

8 cough sounds

12 crying sounds

200 immersive female character dialogue lines - like that’s an order, get to the helicopter, sound off if you’re in position

14 fighting vocalizations

14 jumping vocalizations

20 laughing sounds

20 pain vocalizations

198 stock dialogue lines you hear in everyday games like yes sir, move in, copy that, affirmative

All Royalty-Free

RTU-OTB (ready to use out of the box)
